remarks: The restriction of a one-to-one onto function to a difference maps onto the difference of the images.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Apr-2009.)
statement: resdif $p |- ( ( Fun `' F /\ ( F |` A ) : A -onto-> C /\ ( F |` B ) : B -onto-> D ) -> ( F |` ( A \ B ) ) : ( A \ B ) -1-1-onto-> ( C \ D ) ) $.
